choices: Freddy comes up with a plan...
1.content:
“Foxy! Relax! Reset the controls! Chica, manually reset the landing gear!”

Bonnie rushes in from his Mechanic’s station. “Our engines are gonna blow!!!”
1.title: What does Captain Do?

info.brief_description: What if the FNAF in space was treated like a real space drama?
info.description:
A FNAF SPACE ADVENTURE!!!
Rules:
Try to keep language and content 13+, foul language allowed
No explicit sex
————-
Space Captain Freddy readied his crew for a landing on Mars.

“Chica! Apply Thrusters! Foxy! Cool engines!”

“Aye aye, Cap’n!” Foxy shouts.

Monitors flashed a million images per second as Freddy dressed in his standard issue space exploration jacket. His round glass helmet was placed upon his head as they prepared for landing.

“Brace yerselves!” Foxy barks. The private held onto his controls for dear life. Red alert icons popped up everywhere.

“What did you do!?!”
info.pretty_title: Five Nights At Freddy’s in Space
